title: Using Smart Technology to Spy on the Public - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/9/17
itunes:title: Using Smart Technology to Spy on the Public - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/9/17
description:
George Noory and guest Eldon Taylor discuss the use of smart technology to spy on the public and what can be done to stop it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
